mapper.update: update WEBPORTAL_CBASE_BUCKET set ID=#{id}, BUCKET_NAME=#{bucketName}, CBASECLUSTER_ID=#{cbaseClusterId}, HCLUSTER_ID=#{hclusterId}, STATUS=#{status}, DELETED=#{deleted}, CREATE_TIME=#{createTime}, CREATE_USER=#{createUser}, UPDATE_TIME=now(), UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser}, BUCKET_TYPE=#{bucketType}, RAMQUOTAMB=#{ramQuotaMB}, AUTH_TYPE=#{authType} where ID=#{id}

update WEBPORTAL_CBASE_BUCKET
ID=#{id},
BUCKET_NAME=#{bucketName},
CBASECLUSTER_ID=#{cbaseClusterId},
HCLUSTER_ID=#{hclusterId},
STATUS=#{status},
DELETED=#{deleted},
CREATE_TIME=#{createTime},
CREATE_USER=#{createUser},
UPDATE_TIME=now(),
UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser},
BUCKET_TYPE=#{bucketType},
RAMQUOTAMB=#{ramQuotaMB},
AUTH_TYPE=#{authType}
where ID=#{id}
mapper.select:
select
,n.CBASECLUSTER_NAME,u.USERNAME,H.HCLUSTER_NAME_ALIAS from WEBPORTAL_CBASE_BUCKET M, WEBPORTAL_CBASECLUSTER_INFO n, WEBPORTAL_USER u, WEBPORTAL_HCLUSTER H where M.CREATE_USER=u.id and M.ID = #{id} and M.CBASECLUSTER_ID = n.ID and M.HCLUSTER_ID = H.ID

select count(1) from WEBPORTAL_CBASE_BUCKET M left join WEBPORTAL_USER u on M.CREATE_USER = u.ID left join WEBPORTAL_HCLUSTER h on M.HCLUSTER_ID = h.ID left join WEBPORTAL_CBASECLUSTER_INFO n on n.ID = M.CBASECLUSTER_ID
and u.USERNAME like CONCAT('%','${userName}','%') escape '^'
and n.CBASECLUSTER_NAME like CONCAT('%','${cbaseClusterName}','%') escape '^'
and h.HCLUSTER_NAME like CONCAT('%','${hclusterName}','%') escape '^'

select
,n.CBASECLUSTER_NAME,u.USERNAME,h.HCLUSTER_NAME_ALIAS from WEBPORTAL_CBASE_BUCKET M left join WEBPORTAL_CBASECLUSTER_INFO n on n.ID = M.CBASECLUSTER_ID left join WEBPORTAL_USER u on M.CREATE_USER = u.ID left join WEBPORTAL_HCLUSTER h on M.HCLUSTER_ID = h.ID
and u.USERNAME like CONCAT('%','${params.userName}','%') escape '^'
and n.CBASECLUSTER_NAME like CONCAT('%','${params.cbaseClusterName}','%') escape '^'
and h.HCLUSTER_NAME like CONCAT('%','${params.hclusterName}','%') escape '^'
ORDER BY M.CREATE_TIME DESC
limit #{page.startRowPosition},#{page.recordsPerPage}
